front.title: Data Center Interconnect Solution for EVPN Overlay networks

abstract.t: This document describes how Network Virtualization Overlay networks (NVO3) can be connected to a Wide Area Network (WAN) in order to extend the layer-2 connectivity required for some tenants. The solution will analyze the interaction between NVO3 networks running EVPN and other L2VPN technologies used in the WAN, such as VPLS/PBB- VPLS or EVPN/PBB-EVPN, and will propose a solution for the interworking between both.
